LZ77_and_LZ78_are_the_two_lossless_data_compression_algorithms_published_in_papers_by_Abraham_Lempel_and_Jacob_Ziv_in_1977_and_1978._They_are_also_known_as_LZ1_and_LZ2_respectively._These_two_algorithms_form_the_basis_for_many_variations_including_LZW,_LZSS,_LZMA_and_others._Besides_their_academic_influence,_these_algorithms_formed_the_basis_of_several_ubiquitous_compression_schemes,_including_GIF_and_the_DEFLATE_algorithm_used_in_PNG_and_ZIP.
